summary: Van Halen was an iconic American rock band from Pasadena, California, formed in 1973. Led by the talented guitarist Eddie Van Halen, the band became famous for their exciting live shows and powerful music. They released many hit albums and singles, like "Jump," and were huge in the 1980s. The band went through several lineup changes over the years, with different lead singers. Van Halen was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2007 and sold over 80 million albums worldwide. Sadly, the band ended after Eddie Van Halen passed away from cancer in 2020.
title: Van Halen
